reviews.text: Delicious Thai food in a beautiful environment! Totally recommended! We were extremely pleased and relieved with the level of care paid to celiac clients: the menu is clearly marked for gluten (there's also a gluten free only menu) and the items are flagged when they arrive at the table. The restaurant is rightfully accredited by the Celiac Association of Spain!

Went for lunch with the family, and it was great overall. I wouldn’t say it’s the “best Thai I have ever had”, however I do acknowledge that they are limited with providing full flavors compared to what is found throughout the world in the Thai cuisine. I would recommend overall especially if you have a Thai craving

The atmosphere is great.
The food is not as I expect and as the reviews said.
The staff are so serious and work like robots, no good treat not good way not smiling at all.

We received dirty cup for our tea, we complain and they just take it and change it without saying any word!!! They are really weird staff.

The place is exceptional, decorations are spot on and I love the leg-under tables at the end of the restaurant. The food tastes delicious, but a little bit too simple for my taste, I loved the weirder dishes such as the beef triangles, but other more conventional dishes such as pastas with vegetables or rice were too simple and normal-tasting for their price tag.
In the pictures there are beef and a mango dessert

A wonderful experience! Quite and warm atmosphere, delicious Thailand food slightly adapted to western taste (but not too much to lose the original one); nice decoration and very reasonable pricing.
I live in Barcelona and many times I choose this restaurant to meet with my friends and spend a great meal together!
